text:
#Brazil 🇧🇷 set a daily record for #COVID19 deaths for the second straight day on Wednesday, as a raging resurgence of the virus led Sao Paulo state to shutter businesses.

As @JJammine reports, the country's government is racing to close #vaccine deals with #Pfizer and Janssen⤵️ https://t.co/w5KFU4oedz
